Hi Gennaro,
Thank You very much for the order and the prompt payment.
Sent the parcel today with good package. Please take note that due to the public health crisis there can be some delay. Please note, that postal service in italy can take over 14 working days!
Regards and very best wishes for your health and comfort.
Roman
